imos
Class EpisodicMemory

java.lang.Object
  imos.EpisodicMemory

public class EpisodicMemory
extends java.lang.Object

Ernest's episodic memory contains all the schemas and acts ever created. It offers methods to record new schemas and acts. Episodic memory can be queried with the method selectAct() that returns the next intention to enact.

Author:
ogeorgeon

          If true then the IMOS does not use random

addAct

public IAct addAct(java.lang.String label,
                   ISchema schema,
                   boolean status,
                   int satisfaction,
                   int confidence)
Add an act to episodic memory if it does not already exist

Parameters:
label - The act's label
schema - The act's schema
status - The act's status
satisfaction - The act's satisfaction
confidence - The act's confidence
Returns:
the new act if created or the already existing acts

addCompositeInteraction

public ISchema addCompositeInteraction(IAct contextAct,
                                       IAct intentionAct)
Add a composite schema and its succeeding act that represent a composite possibility of interaction between Ernest and its environment.

Parameters:
contextAct - The context Act.
intentionAct - The intention Act.
Returns:
The schema made of the two specified acts, whether it has been created or it already existed.

addFailingInteraction

public IAct addFailingInteraction(ISchema schema,
                                  int satisfaction)
Add or update a failing possibility of interaction between Ernest and its environment. Add or update the schema's failing act to Ernest's memory. If the failing act does not exist then create it. If the failing act exists then update its satisfaction.

Parameters:
schema - The schema that failed.
satisfaction - The satisfaction obtained during the failure.
Returns:
The failing act.

record

public java.util.List<IAct> record(java.util.List<IAct> contextList,
                                   IAct intentionAct)
Learn from an enacted intention after a given context. Returns the list of learned acts that are based on reliable subacts. The first act of the list is the stream act.

Parameters:
contextList - The list of acts that constitute the context in which the learning occurs.
intentionAct - The intention.
Returns:
A list of the acts created from the learning. The first act of the list is the stream act if the first act of the contextList was the performed act.

selectAct

public IAct selectAct(java.util.List<IAct> activationList)
Select an intention act from a given activation list. The selected act receives an activation value

Parameters:
activationList - The list of acts that activate episodic memory.
Returns:
The selected act.
